mapper.select: select /** AdmDlayNtfcBat.selectByKey */ PJT_ID, RECRC_HRS_NO, RMDR_HRS_NO, cre_usr_id, cre_dt, upd_usr_id, upd_dt from ADM_DLAY_NTFC_BAT where 1 = 1 and PJT_ID = #{pjtId}
mapper.update: update /** AdmDlayNtfcBat.update */ ADM_DLAY_NTFC_BAT set PJT_ID = #{pjtId}, RECRC_HRS_NO = #{recrcHrsNo}, RMDR_HRS_NO = #{rmdrHrsNo}, upd_usr_id = #{updateUser}, upd_dt = sysdate where 1 = 1 and PJT_ID = #{pjtId}
mapper.insert: insert /** AdmDlayNtfcBat.insert */ into ADM_DLAY_NTFC_BAT(PJT_ID, RECRC_HRS_NO, RMDR_HRS_NO, cre_usr_id, cre_dt, upd_usr_id, upd_dt) values (#{pjtId}, #{recrcHrsNo}, #{rmdrHrsNo}, #{createUser}, sysdate, #{updateUser}, sysdate)
